dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for detecting hate speech in tweets targeting women and immigrants in English and Spanish. The English subset contains 9000 training, 1000 validation, and 2971 test tweets.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 5: Multilingual Detection of Hate Speech (HatEval)
